title: Explore the Stunning ROYN Yonaguni Airport by FSFormosa for MSFS!
description:
Welcome to our latest video showcasing the incredible ROYN Yonaguni Airport, meticulously crafted by FSFormosa for Microsoft Flight Simulator (MSFS). Located on Yonaguni Island, the westernmost point of Japan, this airport is a gateway to breathtaking scenery and unique cultural experiences.

In this video, weâ€™ll take you on a tour of the airportâ€™s high-resolution details, including realistic PBR textures, custom ground textures, and beautifully rendered local landmarks like the Irizaki Lighthouse and Dr. Koto Clinic. Whether youâ€™re a flight simulation enthusiast or just love exploring new destinations, this add-on is a must-have for your MSFS collection.
